  COLOR_success: '#dbf2d6',
  color_warning: '#eabe5c',
  COLOR_warning: '#ffedbe',
  color_tip: '#2688b2',
  COLOR_tip: '#caebfb',

    small_mid: 420 // 
    ,
    mid_big: 920 // 120 + 400 * 2

  }
}; // white to black https://www.colorhexa.com/ffffff

const themes = {
  light: { ...common,
    name: "light",
    color_strong: 'hsl(240, 5%, 0%)' // 12%씩
    ,
    color_normal: 'hsl(240, 5%, 12%)',
    color_weak: '#777777',
    color_very_weak: '#cccccc',
    COLOR_normal: 'hsl(240, 15%, 100%)' // 3% 씩
    ,
    COLOR_middle: 'hsl(240, 15%, 96%)',
    COLOR_bg: 'hsl(240, 15%, 92%)'
  },
  dark: { ...common,
    name: "dark",
    color_strong: 'hsl(240, 15%, 100%)' // 12% 씩
    ,
    color_normal: 'hsl(240, 15%, 90%)',
    color_weak: '#888888',
    color_very_weak: '#333333',
    COLOR_normal: 'hsl(240, 5%, 8%)' // 4% 씩
    ,
    COLOR_middle: 'hsl(240, 5%, 4%)',
    COLOR_bg: 'hsl(240, 5%, 0%)'
  }
};
export default themes;

sourcesContent:
const common = {
    
    color_active: '#00B9FF'
    ,color_neutral: '#888888'
    
    ,color_error: '#c86765'
    ,COLOR_error: '#fac7c6'
    
    ,color_success: '#4c906b'
    ,COLOR_success: '#dbf2d6'
    
    ,color_warning: '#eabe5c'
    ,COLOR_warning: '#ffedbe'
    
    ,color_tip: '#2688b2'
    ,COLOR_tip: '#caebfb'
    
    
    ,media: {
        
        small_mid: 420 // 
        ,mid_big: 920 // 120 + 400 * 2
    }
    
}


// white to black https://www.colorhexa.com/ffffff
const themes =  {

    light: {
    
        ...common
        
        ,name: "light"
        
        ,color_strong: 'hsl(240, 5%, 0%)'   // 12%씩
        ,color_normal: 'hsl(240, 5%, 12%)'
        ,color_weak: '#777777'
        ,color_very_weak: '#cccccc'
        
        ,COLOR_normal: 'hsl(240, 15%, 100%)'  // 3% 씩
        ,COLOR_middle: 'hsl(240, 15%, 96%)'
        ,COLOR_bg: 'hsl(240, 15%, 92%)'
        
        
    },

    dark: {
    
        ...common
        
        ,name: "dark"
        
        ,color_strong: 'hsl(240, 15%, 100%)'   // 12% 씩
        ,color_normal: 'hsl(240, 15%, 90%)'
        ,color_weak: '#888888'
        ,color_very_weak: '#333333'
        
        
        ,COLOR_normal: 'hsl(240, 5%, 8%)'   // 4% 씩
        ,COLOR_middle: 'hsl(240, 5%, 4%)'
        ,COLOR_bg: 'hsl(240, 5%, 0%)'
        
    
    }
    
}

export default themes
